```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(imager)
```
```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2020-07-28')
penguins <- tuesdata$penguins
```
```{r}
penguins %>% 
ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, colour = species)) +
  labs(x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
       y = "Body Mass (g)",
       title = "Mass and Flipper Length of Penguins by Species",
       caption = "Data from Dr. Kristen Gorman and the Palmer Station, Artwork by @allison_horst")
```
```{r}
im <- load.image("images/penguins.png")
```
```{r}
thmb <- resize(im,round(width(im)/2),round(height(im)/2))
```
